value.desc: Date of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

title.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header title; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode

subtitle.desc: When specified, it overrides the default header subtitle; Makes sense when not in 'minimal' mode

emit-immediately.desc: Emit model when user browses month and year too

default-year-month.desc: The default year and month to display (in YYYY/MM format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null)

default-view.desc: The view which will be displayed by default

events.desc: A list of events to highlight on the calendar; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (matches or not)

event-color.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette); If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a String (color for the received date)

options.desc: Optionally configure the days that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the date as a String and must return a Boolean (is date acceptable or not)

years.desc: Optionally configure the years that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the year as an integer and must return a Boolean (is year acceptable or not). If the year is not acceptable, every day of the year will be disabled.

disabled-years.desc: Optionally configure the years that are disabled; If using a function, it receives the year as an integer and must return a Boolean (is year disabled or not). If the year is disabled, every day of the year will be disabled.

months.desc: Optionally configure the months that are selectable; If using a function, it receives the year and the month as an integer and must return a Boolean (is month acceptable or not). If the month is not acceptable, every day of the month will be disabled.

disabled-months.desc: Optionally configure the months that are disabled; If using a function, it receives the year and the month as an integer and must return a Boolean (is month disabled or not). If the month is disabled, every day of the month will be disabled.

first-day-of-week.desc: Sets the day of the week that is considered the first day (0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, ...); This day will show in the left-most column of the calendar

today-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current day

reason.desc: Reason of the user interaction (what was picked)

details.desc: Object of properties on the new model
